About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a 20-year-old who lives in Copenhagen and loves to code. I just recently finished high school, and currently holding a gap-year. The reason why I choose to do that was so I could practice web development and once I felt comfortable with it, I wanted to apply for a job as a Junior Web Developer to get some experience. Down below you can see what programming languages and frameworks I have learned. I also included things I have worked on in the past as a part-time freelancer on Fiverr.

Web Development

Full Stack Developer

When it comes to Web Development, the first three languages I learned where HTML, CSS, and Javascript. I started creating simple static web pages, but after some time I wanted to expand upon that and started learning PHP and Mysqli with the purpose of implementing backend functionalities such as a login system and a database where I could store information.

After that, I did a couple of projects such as building a WordPress theme from scracth using bootstrap which is a front-end framework. To see some of these projects live go to "MY WORK" or click here to get redirected to my Github account.
